about.text: Hi! Nikitosha is a passionate Front-End React Developer based in Grodno, Belarus. üåç

skills.text: As a Junior Front-End Developer, Nikitasha has an impressive arsenal of skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and SCSS. Nikitosha excels at developing and maintaining responsive websites that offer a smooth user experience. His expertise lies in crafting dynamic, engaging interfaces through writing clean and optimized code and utilizing cutting-edge development tools and techniques.

shop.text: An online store is a convenient way to buy food and other everyday goods. The service provides an interface for searching, ordering products, as well as a personal account with the implementation of the basket, favorites and information about orders.

weather.text: Weather is an application that provides information about the weather in your region. Implemented the functionality of searching for cities, viewing detailed information. There is a functionality for changing the application theme and language.

documents.text: Document Sharing is an application that allows users to share files. Implemented a personal account, the functions of downloading, deleting files. In addition, it is possible to share files and create folders.

form.messageExample: One day a brick fell on my head and then I realized that I wanted to be a programmer...
